reg_pit.acttitle: Special Wine Store Licence Auction Act
reg_pit.title: Special Wine Store Licence Auction Regulation

change.changenote: Section 8 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 291/2016, effective January 23, 2017.

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 12 of the Act, the deposit of a successful bidder is not forfeited if the bidder's application for a special wine store licence is refused under section 16 (1) (a) of the Liquor Control and Licensing Act because, in the general manager's opinion, the bidder is not a fit and proper person.
